thread.title: The Chase viewers in hysterics over contestants' names - and are convinced it must be a joke
thread.title_full: The Chase viewers in hysterics over contestants' names - and are convinced it must be a joke

author: Nicola Oakley
title: The Chase viewers in hysterics over contestants' names - and are convinced it must be a joke
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Viewers tuning in to last night's episode of The Chase did a double take - and it must have crossed their minds that they had switched on to the wrong show. 
Why? Because the names of the contestants sounded VERY familiar. 
And it even led some to question whether the whole thing was a joke. 
You see, the four contestants had the same names as four of the main six characters in Friends. Everyone was making the same gag And some people were convinced the show's producers were having a laugh 
So many people were tweeting about it, viewers started getting irate. One tweeted: 'OK, I f***ing get it, the names of the people are Friends characters! I don't need to see another 2,000 f***ing tweets about it!' Read More The show did have one little joke 
Yes, they threw a cheeky Friends question in there, presumably as a nod to the team's names. Apparently it didn't beat this episode... 
Unfortunately it just wasn't to be for the amusingly-named team, and they were beaten by the The Vixen with just Joe and Ross left. Like us on Facebook
